# MPShuffleType.collections

**Case**

Collections of items are shuffled during playback.

## Declaration

```swift
case collections
```

## Shuffle types

- **MPShuffleType.off**: Nothing is shuffled during playback.
- **MPShuffleType.items**: Individual items are shuffled during playback.

items.description: Individual items are shuffled during playback.
items.name: MPShuffleType.items
